title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire on Tuesday, 8 March 2016 - BBC News
summary: county council leader jim harker says he was n't invited to a meeting between borough and district council leaders on unitary authority plans .
the search for a missing woman , who grew up in wellingborough and disappeared from grimsby in 1993 , has been renewed .
northampton town boss chris wilder has been nominated for the league two manager of the month award .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on wednesday .

documents.title: our live coverage through the day
text: local live is finished for today but we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 with all the latest news , weather , sport and travel for northamptonshire .

documents.title: education secretary says 'eu membership is critical ' to women 's rights
text: education secretary nicky morgan has contradicted her government colleague south northamptonshire mp andrea leadsom and said that women 's right would be `` at risk '' if britain were to leave the eu .
ms leadsom , an energy minister , had said it was `` absolutely not the case '' women 's rights would be diminished if the uk left the eu .

however , nicky morgan ( `` from safeguarding parental leave to tackling discrimination in the workplace and bringing an end to violence against women and girls , our eu membership is critical in helping protect and further the rights of women around britain . ''
author: BBC Politics

documents.title: railway lines reopen in kettering and wellingborough after woman killed by train
text: railway lines in kettering and wellingborough have reopened after a woman died when she was hit by a train - but passengers are being warned to expect delays for several more hours .
author: Northants Herald & Post

documents.title: women 's rights 'being eroded ' by eu , says female pro-brexit group
text: a cross-party women for britain campaign - launched today on international women 's day - aims to encourage women to vote to leave the european union in the 23 june referendum and says women 's rights are being eroded because of the uk 's eu membership .

south northamptonshire mp , and energy minister , andrea leadsom , said women cared about issues such as the cost of living , the cost of the uk 's eu membership and future prospects for themselves and their children - and argued that life outside the eu for `` many people '' , including women , would be `` much better '' .
author: BBC Politics

documents.title: weather : rain coming and could be heavy
text: it will stay cloudy this evening with some patches of light rain or drizzle , before turning wet and windy overnight with lows of 4c ( 39f ) .
tomorrow , it will be staying cloudy and wet throughout the day with prolonged spells of rain .
highs of 6c ( 43f ) .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: county cricket club post loss of almost half a million , but have n't used council loan
text: northamptonshire county cricket club has published its finances for the last year and even though the county side has had an increase in losses of almost 50 % it has yet to use a loan from the borough council approved last year .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: international women 's day : why women can thrive in sci-fi
text: to mark international women 's day , jennifer k. stuller , a pop culture historian , has spoken todr lorna jowett , who specialises in film studies at the university of northampton about the hero of the award-winning mad max : fury road , furiosa , ( played by charlize theron .
`` the interesting thing about fury road was that its female protagonist was a woman , not a girl , with many years of experience and skill , '' said dr jowett .
dr jowett , who written books on buffy the vampire slayer , also praises tv show 'orphan black ' as the `` most interesting female-centred science fiction series in recent years '' .
author: BBC Entertainment and Arts

documents.title: yellow warning issued as northamptonshire faces persistent , heavy rain
text: the met office has issued a yellow weather warning of rain for northamptonshire from 01:00 to 15:00 tomorrow .
persistent rain , heavy at times , is expected from the early hours of wednesday , continuing during the morning before slowly easing in the afternoon .
accompanied by windy conditions , this rain is likely to produce some flooding and difficult driving conditions .
the met office say `` widespread rainfall accumulations of 20 to 30 mm are expected '' .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: no decision from avon on maria sharapova following positive drugs test
text: northampton-based avon , who have maria sharapova as the face of their perfume 'luck ' , have told me `` we do n't have a statement to make at this moment in time '' over the tennis star 's positive drugs test .
sponsors , such as nike and tag heuer , have moved quickly to distance themselves from sharapova , after the five-time grand slam tennis champion admitted taking banned substance meldonium .
author: Richard Conway
BBC Sports news correspondent

documents.title: development of 1,000 homes outside northampton gets go-ahead on appeal
text: developers have been given the green light to build 1,000 homes and double the size of a village outside northampton after the secretary of state upheld their appeal .
author: Northampton Chronicle & Echo

documents.title: website created for chester farm restoration project
text: a new website has been launched for chester farm near irchester to give more details on a £ 12.7m project , which is part funded by the heritage lottery fund .
the restoration project will aim to have the site , which contains the remains of a roman walled town , public in may 2016 and fully open by april 2018 .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: county council do n't want to be 'simply ruling options out ' over unitary authorities
text: the deputy leader of northamptonshire county council has responded to a statement from district and borough council leaders in the county which said a countywide unitary authority was the worst option .
the debate was started by a letter from northamptonshire 's mps calling for reform of the current political systems in the area .

councillor heather smith said she `` would be interested to see the analysis '' that led to a countywide option being dismissed , adding her authority would `` rather focus on what is required rather than simply ruling options out with no discussion '' .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : two lanes closed on m1 northbound at junction 16
text: there are two lanes closed on the m1 northbound between junction 16 ( daventry ) and junction 17 ( dunchurch ) due to a broken down lorry .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: countywide unitary 'worst option ' say borough and district council leaders
text: everyone other than the county council agrees `` the worst option is a countywide unitary '' , according to leaders of borough and district councils throughout northamptonshire .

last week all seven of northamptonshire 's mps asked council leaders to look at creating new unitary authorities for the council , while the leader of northamptonshire county council , jim harker , said his `` ideal '' would one single council for the whole county .

in a statement , the district and borough leaders - from corby , daventry , east northants , kettering , northampton , wellingborough and south northamptonshire - said although they `` have n't opened this debate '' , they would work to find out what is best for residents .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cobblers manager wilder 'delighted ' with mcdonald 's player of the month nomination
text: at sixfields today chris wilder told me he is `` delighted '' defender rod mcdonald has been nominated for league two player of the month , describing him a `` non-league nugget '' .

northampton signed the 23-year-old from telford united at the beginning of this season , but wilder told me there is n't many more players like mcdonald in the lower leagues saying `` non league players are sat in pub on a sunday for a reason '' .
author: Joe Townsend
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: eu referendum campaign 'quite male dominated '
text: the debate on the uk 's future in the eu ahead of the upcoming in-out referendum has been `` quite male dominated '' , energy minister and south northamptonshire mp andrea leadsom has said .
she was speaking ahead of the launch of pro-exit women for britain , which aims to engage women in the referendum saying the power of the women 's vote is undermined by being in the eu .
an equivalent group women in , which is trying to target women voters on the remain side , says the benefits of being in the eu `` clearly outweigh the costs '' .
author: BBC Politics

documents.title: travel : no trains between kettering , wellingborough and bedford
text: there is currently no service on east midlands trains between kettering , wellingborough and bedford after a person was hit by a train .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: oxfordshire man named following fatal collision on m1 last month
text: a 45-year-old man who died following a fatal collision on the m1 on wednesday , 10 february , has been named as robert gibson of shipton road in woodstock , oxfordshire .
mr gibson , who was a pedestrian , was in collision with a white iveco hgv on the m1 southbound opposite the northampton services and died at the scene .
an inquest was opened and adjourned yesterday .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fresh appeal in missing jaime cheesman case
text: police have made a fresh appeal about the whereabouts of jaime cheesman , who grew up in wellingborough and went missing from her home in grimsby in early november 1993 .
miss cheesman , who would now be 39 , moved to grimsby to live with her best friend a few months prior to her disappearance .
the on the right is what detectives think she may look like now .
detective chief inspector phil gadd , in charge of the inquiry , said an `` extensive forensic examination '' will take place at her former address in grimsby .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: abused female ref speaks out over wellingborough town chairman 's ban
text: the referee at the centre of a case which saw the football association ban a club chairman for abusing a female official has been speaking to me for the victoria derbyshire programme .

martin potton , the chairman of non-league club wellingborough town , was fined last year for using derogatory and insulting language towards 22-year-old mary harmer ( who he said was n't fit to referee in the men 's game .
he denied the claims , but the fa banned him for five games .
you can see my full report here or by clicking on the 'key video ' section on this page .
author: Robyn Cowen
The Victoria Derbyshire programme

documents.title: travel : a43 re-opened between northampton and kettering
text: the a43 between round spinney and kettering has re-opened following an incident at the sywell/holcot roundabout which closed the road from 08:00 .
two people were taken to hospital follow the crash involving a car and two lorries .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: singer from northampton progresses in the voice uk
text: northampton 's chase morton took the stage in bbc one 's the voice uk last weekend , and won through his 'battle round ' against j sealy .
morton , 30 , who is on boy george 's team , will now take part in the 'the knockouts ' which start on saturday on bbc one at 19.30 .
author: BBC One

documents.title: headlines : county council leader not invited to authority shake-up meeting cricket club posts 50 % increase in losses
text: here are your lunchtime headlines :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: weather : rather cloudy with the odd shower
text: there is cloud around today along with some sunshine - here 's pattishall as captured by bbc weather watcher 'paulamaria ' .
through this afternoon , there will be a good deal of cloud around which may produce the odd shower .
however , the cloud should break at times to allow some brighter intervals with a top temperature of 5c ( 41f ) .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: motorcyclist injured in crash yesterday on a45
text: a motorcyclist has been seriously injured following a collision on the a45 near rushden .

the 32-year-old man from higham ferrers was airlifted to hospital with head and leg injuries after his bike hit the kerb and a barrier on the eastbound carriageway just before 17:00 yesterday afternoon .
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: saints north in unchanged wales line-up for england match
text: northampton saints wing george north is in an unchanged team for wales ' crucial six nations match against england at twickenham on saturday .
north , 23 , has scored two tries so far in the championship .
including the winning try in his country 's 19-10 win over france .
england will announce their team later this week .
it will be captained by saints hooker dylan hartley .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: travel : a43 still closed and expected to remain so until this afternoon
text: the a43 between round spinney and the a14 junction south of kettering is closed in both directions , but police are hopeful it will be re-opened in the `` early afternoon '' as they are waiting for the vehicles involved to be recovered .
there was accident involved three vehicles , two of which were lorries , at 08:00 this morning at the sywell/holcot roundabout .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: university says getting school children 'involved ' in science boosts degree recruitment
text: linda davis-sinclair , from the university of northampton , told me that in her 14 years at the institution it has `` had school groups coming on the campus to encourage them to get involved in the sciences and that has improved our recruitment rate '' .

she was speaking after the careers and enterprise company , the national provider of careers advice , said northants is one of england 's science , technology , engineering and math ( stem ) `` cold spots , '' with a 13 % lower take-up of stem subjects than neighbouring buckinghamshire .
but the university of northampton says it has an `` extensive '' programme working with schools and last week ran an event for year 3 girls from 18 primary schools around the county .
author: Willy Gilder
BBC Northampton

documents.title: new weedon cafe made a charity effort on its first day
text: a new cafe opened its doors in weedon last week , and marked the event by supporting the red cross in daventry .
author: Daventry Express

documents.title: northamptonshire cricket club yet to use borough council loan despite financial pressure
text: northamptonshire county cricket club has not yet drawn on a loan of a quarter of a million pounds from northampton borough council , despite its latest financial figures showing increasing debts .
losses at the club are up from £ 305,000 to £ 450,000 compared to last year .
the council loan was given to help the club return to a stable financial position .
chief executive ray payne said : `` it was a key objective last year to develop a strong income stream away from the pitch .
a key strategy of the board is to strive for financial independence from the ecb . ''
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: decrease in ecb contribution a major factor as county cricket club posts losses
text: northamptonshire county cricket club says it is showing `` strong signs of recovery '' despite an increase in losses of almost 50 % .
northamptonshire have published their results for the financial year ending in september 2015 , with turnover `` comparable to the previous year '' but losses up from £ 305,000 to £ 450,000 .
this can be largely explained by a decrease in england and wales cricket board ( ecb ) contributions of nearly £ 350,000 .
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: two hospitalised after crash on a43
text: one person had to cut out of their vehicle and taken to hospital by air ambulance following a crash on the northbound a43 at the sywell/holcot roundabout .
another person was also cut out of their vehicle and taken by land ambulance to hospital after the crash , which involved three vehicles at around 08:00 this morning .
fire crew attended from moulton , the mounts and mereway .
the a43 between round spinney in northampton and the a14 junction south of kettering remains closed .
more on this when we get it .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: recruitment day for 200 jobs at primark distribution centre to take place in kettering
text: a recruitment day to fill more than 200 jobs at a new distribution centre for primark is taking place tomorrow .
author: Northamptonshire Telegraph

documents.title: northamptonshire vying for one county championship promotion place
text: only one team will be promoted from division two of cricket 's county championship this summer in order to reduce the number of top-tier teams in 2017 .
there are also changes to the one day competitions which will come in 2017 , including moving the t20 blast , which northamptonshire won in 2013 ( to the second half of the season .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: northampton town defender mcdonald nominated for player of the month
text: cobblers defender rod mcdonald has been nominated for league two 's player of the month for february .
the 23-year-old , who recently signed a new contract with the club , was part of northampton town 's very tight defence , and even scored an overhead kick against leyton orient .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: county council leader did not know about tonight 's unitary authority discussions
text: the leader of northamptonshire county council , jim harker , has told me he did not know anything about tonight 's meeting between all the district and borough council leaders , until he heard it on bbc radio northampton .

the council leaders will be discussing proposals to form new unitary authorities in the county , but most have dismissed councillor harker 's `` ideal '' plan to form one new council for the whole of the county to control all services for northamptonshire .
author: Stuart Linnell
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: meeting tonight to discuss forming new councils in northamptonshire
text: the leaders of all northamptonshire 's councils will meet today to discuss a possible shake-up of local government in the county , after all seven of the county 's mps wrote a letter asking for them to discuss forming one or more unitary authorities .

last night , northampton borough councillors rejected a county council plan for a new single authority to run all services in northamptonshire saying northampton is big enough for a single council of its own .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: poor take up of a level science , technology , engineering and mathematics in northants
text: a report from the careers and enterprise company , the national provider of careers advice , identifies northamptonshire as a poor performer when it come to the numbers of students who take stem subjects - science , technology , engineering and mathematics - at a level .

the report says there are marked discrepancies around the country , and warns industry faces a major problem recruiting the scientists and engineers of the future if not enough students are pursuing careers in these areas .
author: Willy Gilder
BBC Northampton

documents.title: travel : a43 closed due to serious accident near sywell
text: the whole stretch of the a43 between spinney hill in northampton and the a14 junction at kettering has been closed this morning while the air ambulance attends the scene of an accident between two lorries near sywell .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: planning permission sought for former scrapyard near kettering
text: new warehouses and industrial buildings are planned for cransley park between junction 8 of the a14 and the a43 , near kettering .
seven years ago work started on turning the site , formerly known as `` cohen 's scrapyard , '' into a business park with 900 jobs promised , but they never materialised .
new planning permission is being sought at a meeting tonight .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: travel : a43 closed in both directions between northampton and kettering
text: the a43 is closed in both directions between round spinney in northampton and kettering because of an accident involved two lorries .
we 'll bring you more details when we get them .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: wilder nominated for league two manager of the month
text: northampton town manager chris wilder has been nominated for league two manager of the month for february .
the cobblers are currently 13 points clear at the top of league two and took 16 points from 18 in the month of february .
wilder has already won the award twice .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your stunning sunrise in northamptonshire
text: there was a stunning sunrise across northamptonshire today .
here it is in oundle , as captured by bbc weather watcher 'gingerwind ' .
you can sign up to be a bbc weather watcher or email your to us .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: weather : cloudy with patchy rain through the day
text: cloud will thicken throughout the morning , and there may be the odd spot of rain around , with a high of 5c ( 41f ) .
you can find more details on the bbc weather website or see my full forecast below :
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: headlines : poor science , technology and maths take up work could start on site near kettering
text: headlines : poor science , technology and maths take up work could start on site near kettering
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: good morning and welcome to local live for northamptonshire
text: between now and 18:00 we 'll bring you the latest news , weather , sport and travel for northamptonshire .
if you want to contact us then please email , tweet or head to facebook .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live
